intro: Koernickea, commonly known as the silverleaf tree, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Fabaceae. It is characterized by its small, delicate leaves that often have a silvery or grayish appearance due to a dense covering of fine hairs. The flowers are typically small and clustered, ranging in color from white to pale purple. Koernickea species are native to arid and semi-arid regions of Africa and Asia. They are often used in traditional medicine and have ecological importance in stabilizing sandy soils.
